name: MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceOptions
desc: Options for adjusting the behavior of an instanced acceleration structure.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates new usage options from a raw integer value.

items.name: static var disableTriangleCulling: MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceOptions
items.desc: An option that turns off culling for this instance if ray intersector has culling enabled.

items.name: static var triangleFrontFacingWindingCounterClockwise: MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the instance specifies front facing triangles in counter-clockwise order.

items.name: static var opaque: MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceOptions
items.desc: Specifies that intersectors should treat the instance as opaque.

items.name: static var nonOpaque: MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceOptions
items.desc: Specifies that intersectors should treat the instance as non-opaque.
